title: Vanilla Chip Dessert
instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, combine the wafer crumbs, butter and brown sugar. Press onto the bottom of a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. Bake at 350° for 5-8 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool.                                                                                            In a microwave, melt white chips; stir until smooth. Cool.                                                                                            In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and sour cream until smooth. Add melted chips; beat well. Fold in whipped topping.                                                                                           Pour filling over crust. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until set. Drizzle with chocolate topping if desired.                                        Yield: 15 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Vanilla Chip Dessert in  Simple & DeliciousJanuary/February 2008, p17                                                                                                                            Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, combine the wafer crumbs, butter and brown sugar. Press onto the bottom of a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 5-8 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool.
In a microwave, melt white chips; stir until smooth. Cool.
In a large bowl, beat cream cheese and sour cream until smooth.
Add melted chips; beat well. Fold in whipped topping.
Pour filling over crust. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until set.
Drizzle with chocolate topping if desired.
